scripts.sb:start: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase start
scripts.sb:stop: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase stop
scripts.sb:diff: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase db diff
scripts.sb:types: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase gen types typescript --local > site/src/lib/database.d.ts
scripts.sb:reset: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase db reset
scripts.sb:push: source .env.local && CLIENT_ID=$CLIENT_ID CLIENT_SECRET=$CLIENT_SECRET npx supabase db push
